D

dealCard(Player, int) - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.blackjack.BlackjackDealer
deal a specified number of Cards to a Player
dealCard(Player, int) - Method in interface com.nickeson.game.cardgame.DealerIntfc
deal a single Card by removing it from the Card collection (deck/shoe), then adding it to a Player's Hand and inUse pile
DealerIntfc - Interface in com.nickeson.game.cardgame
Title: DealerIntfc.java

Project: Card Games

Description: DealerIntfc interface provides ability to deal a Card or Hand

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

dealHand(Player) - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.blackjack.BlackjackDealer
deal a Hand of Blackjack (2 cards to every Player)
dealHand(Player) - Method in interface com.nickeson.game.cardgame.DealerIntfc
deal a Hand of Cards by removing the Cards from the Card collection, (deck/shoe), then adding them to the Player's Hand and inUse pile
DeckIntfc - Interface in com.nickeson.game.cardgame
Title: DeckIntfc.java

Project: Blackjack

Description: An interface for a collection of Playing Cards (Deck) for use in various card games.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

DECKTYPE - Static variable in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Shoe
 
discard(Card) - Method in interface com.nickeson.game.cardgame.DeckIntfc
remove a specific Card from the Deck or inUse pile and add to discards pile
discard(Card) - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.StdDeck
remove specified Card from the Deck or inUse pile to the discards pile
